description:
Kurutsu Karen is the daughter of the town mayor. Her manners and speech are both rough, and she carries a knife with her everywhere she goes. She is right in the middle of her rebellious phase. She is a girl of common sense among the islanders, and a late bloomer in matters of love. Five years ago, her mother abandoned her family and the island and crossed to the mainland. She has always admired her mother, and she herself dreams of escaping the island to the mainland.
Source: Anime News Network
name: Kurutsu Karen
